summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of A portion of The Alley in Block 49, Yesler's 2nd Addition, being the portion of the alley between 24th Avenue North and 25th Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Thomas Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14024 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
